name: Direct Marketing: Travel-Related Arrangement Services
description:
Merchants that sell travel-related arrangement services via
outbound telemarketing methods in which the merchant initiates
contact with the consumer through direct mail, advertising, or other
direct marketing methods requiring consumer response in an
attempt to generate a sale. Also included are discount travel clubs
and subscription services or newsletters from which subscribers
select prepackaged trips; these often require an annual membership
fee that may be billed to the cardholder’s account each year until
canceled by the cardholder or the merchant.
For travel agents and tour operators, use MCC 4722.
